column4: could somebody help me .. i have intel xeon processor, the old 2.6.11 kernel i had the 2 processor when i do cat /proc/cpuinfo but i used the same config and compiled the 2.6.15.5 .. but its keep giving me only one processor and i have enabled the smp and HT on the configuration .. does anybody know what am i missing
nope you just need the smp kernel and it should work.
i have the smp kernel but only getting one cpu but if i boot with old kernle i get 2 cpu
hrmm.... dunno there. Should be working.
